price: Shi ne Wanda Ya halitta muku abin da ke a cikin ƙasa gaba ɗaya, sa'an nan kuma Ya daidaita* zuwa sama, sa'an nan Y a aikata su sammai bakwai. Kuma Shi ga dukan kõmai Masani ne.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ لَكُم مَّا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰٓ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَسَوَّىٰهُنَّ سَبۡعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٖۚ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ
footnotes: * Ya daidaita, watau Ya yi nufi; "Sa'an nan" yana amfãnar da jeranta aiki bã jerantar nufi ba, dõmin sifõfn Allah dukansu, bã fãrarru ba ne.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī khalaqa lakum mā fī al-arḍi jamīʿan thumma is'tawā ilā al-samāi fasawwāhunna sabʿa samāwātin wahuwa bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
